trans-unit.source: Based on the Test Plan Setup, it is possible to either create a test order manually from several document types (unless otherwise noted, click Functions > Create Test Order on the Lines FastTab) or let the system create the test order automatically.

seg-source.mrk: Based on the Test Plan Setup, it is possible to either create a test order manually from several document types (unless otherwise noted, click Functions > Create Test Order on the Lines FastTab) or let the system create the test order automatically.

trans-unit.source: Test Order / Test Incident will be created automatically a when Purchase Order is released. An additional Test Order / Test Incident can be created by user by using the “Create Test Order” function on the Purchase Order line.

seg-source.mrk: Test Order / Test Incident will be created automatically a when Purchase Order is released.
An additional Test Order / Test Incident can be created by user by using the “Create Test Order” function on the Purchase Order line.

trans-unit.source: Test Order / Test Incident will be created automatically when a receipt line is posted. An additional Test Order / Test Incident can be created manually by using the “Create Test Order” function on the Warehouse Receipt line.

seg-source.mrk: Test Order / Test Incident will be created automatically when a receipt line is posted.
An additional Test Order / Test Incident can be created manually by using the “Create Test Order” function on the Warehouse Receipt line.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the setting in the Prod. Test Order Creation field of Quality Management Setup, a Test Order is created:

seg-source.mrk: Depending on the setting in the <span class="Bold">Prod.
Test Order Creation field of Quality Management Setup, a Test Order is created:

trans-unit.source: automatically by changing Production Order Status to Released

seg-source.mrk: automatically by changing Production Order Status to Released

trans-unit.source: manually by user (Lines FastTab > Line > Create Test Order)

seg-source.mrk: manually by user (Lines FastTab > Line > Create Test Order)

trans-unit.source: Depending on the setting of the Prod. Test Order Creation field in Quality Management Setup, a Test Order is created:

seg-source.mrk: Depending on the setting of the <span class="Bold">Prod.
Test Order Creation field in Quality Management Setup, a Test Order is created:

trans-unit.source: automatically by changing the Production Order Status to Released

seg-source.mrk: automatically by changing the Production Order Status to Released

trans-unit.source: manually by user (Home tab > Create Test Order)

seg-source.mrk: manually by user (Home tab > Create Test Order)

trans-unit.source: Manual (Home tab > Create Test Order)

seg-source.mrk: Manual (Home tab > Create Test Order)

trans-unit.source: An inventory check can only be done in connection with lot numbers, not for serial numbers.

seg-source.mrk: An inventory check can only be done in connection with lot numbers, not for serial numbers.

trans-unit.source: Manual (Home tab > Create Test Orders)

seg-source.mrk: Manual (Home tab > Create Test Orders)

trans-unit.source: Exercise – Generate a Test Order Automatically

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Generate a Test Order Automatically

trans-unit.source: In this exercise, create a purchase order for 500 units of item Q-40014 and then post the receipt. This will automatically create a test order.

seg-source.mrk: In this exercise, create a purchase order for 500 units of item Q-40014 and then post the receipt.
This will automatically create a test order.

trans-unit.source: Review the Test Plan Setup for Item Q-40014

seg-source.mrk: Review the Test Plan Setup for Item Q-40014

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to review the Test Plan Setup for item Q-40014:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to review the Test Plan Setup for item Q-40014:

trans-unit.source: On the cc|quality management menu, click cc|quality management > Items.

seg-source.mrk: On the cc|quality management menu, click cc|quality management > Items.

trans-unit.source: Click Test Plan Setup on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: Click Test Plan Setup on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: : Test Plan Setup for item Q-40014

seg-source.mrk: : Test Plan Setup for item Q-40014

trans-unit.source: Note that the item is to be tested with test plan TP00002 on purchase receipt.

seg-source.mrk: Note that the item is to be tested with test plan TP00002 on purchase receipt.

trans-unit.source: Close the Test Plan Setup page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Test Plan Setup page.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to process the purchase order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to process the purchase order:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Purchasing > Order Processing > Purchase Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Purchasing > Order Processing > Purchase Orders.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER or TAB.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER or TAB.

trans-unit.source: In the Buy-from Vendor No. field, enter V00010.
In the Lines FastTab, enter Item in the Type field.

seg-source.mrk: In the Lines FastTab, enter Item in the Type field.

trans-unit.source: In the No. field, enter Q-40014.
In the Location Code field, enter MAINWH.

seg-source.mrk: In the Location Code field, enter MAINWH.

trans-unit.source: In the No. of Units field, type 5.
On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Actions > Assign Lot No.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Actions > Assign Lot No.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

trans-unit.source: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click cc|quality management > Test Orders per Status > Test Orders - Created.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click cc|quality management > Test Orders per Status > Test Orders - Created.

trans-unit.source: Open the test order for item Q-40014 (refer to <MadCap:xref href="Test Orders.htm#_Ref286332766" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 2</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Open the test order for item Q-40014 (refer to <MadCap:xref href="Test Orders.htm#_Ref286332766" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 2</MadCap:xref>).
